text: Laguna City is a little city of south of the Brazil, in Santa Catarina State. This city have more than 50000 people. It was the capital of the short-lived Juliana Republic in 1839. The city is known for having dolphins Some popular beaches of this city: *Mar Grosso beach *Iró beach *Gravatá beach *Gi beach. Category:Cities in Santa Catarina
title: Laguna
